```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

First, we will need sample data:
```{r}
wfs <- ows4R::WFSClient$new('https://sgx.geodatenzentrum.de/wfs_vg250', serviceVersion = '2.0.0')
cgn <- wfs$getCapabilities()$findFeatureTypeByName('vg250:vg250_rbz')$getFeatures()
sample_data <- sf::st_sample(cgn, 100) %>%
        sf::st_transform(4326) %>%
        sf::st_coordinates() %>%
        as.data.frame()
```

```{r setup}
library(ORSRouting)
```
